Trade/Device Name(s): INFINITI System Assay for Factor II & Factor V
Regulation Name(s): Factor V Leiden DNA Mutation Detection System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for INFINITI System Assay and Analyzer for qualitative detection and genotyping of Factor II and Factor V DNA mutations in human blood using PCR and microarray technology
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative genotyping assay for Factor II (Prothrombin) G20210A and Factor V Leiden G1691A mutations in human blood, as an aid to diagnosis in evaluating patients with suspected thrombophilia
